column4: Hi, when I close the lid of my netbook, it suspends, even though I told it to blank the screen instead, and it totally ignores that the power manager inhibit applet is set to inhibit automatic sleep.
I was just thinking of that, but it didn't do this with 9.04. I'll go check the BIOS.
it is not the BIOS. There isn't even a setting in there.
